se.lu.nateko.edca.svc

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.lu.nateko.edca.svc.ServerConnection

  • public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object

See the GNU General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along * with EDCA. If not, see "http://www.gnu.org/licenses/". * * The latest source for this software can be accessed at * "github.org/mattiassp/edca". * * EDCA also utilizes the JTS Topology Suite, Version 1.8 by Vivid * Solutions Inc. It is released under the Lesser General Public License * ("http://www.gnu.org/licenses/") and its source can be accessed at the * JTS Topology Suite website ("http://www.vividsolutions.com/jts"). * * Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. The Android source is released * under the Apache License 2.0 * ("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0") and can be accessed at * "http://source.android.com/". * * For other enquiries, e-mail to: edca.contact@gmail.com * * ServerConnection object class, instantiated and managed by a BackboneSvc * object. Carries e.g. strings with IP address, port and path to a * geospatial server as instance variables. * *

    0.45, 2012-09-26 * *

    Mattias Spångmyr *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Long mID
      The ID of the ServerConnection corresponding to the row ID in the local SQLite database.
      private java.lang.String mIPaddress
      The IP address to the server this ServerConnection connects to.
      private java.lang.String mLastUse
      The time and date of the last time the ServerConnection was connected to.
      private java.lang.String mName
      The name of the ServerConnection.
      private java.lang.String mPath
      The path to the geospatial server.
      private java.lang.String mPort
      The port number to the server this ServerConnection connects to.
      private java.lang.String mWorkspace
      The workspace to use on the geospatial server.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerConnection(java.lang.Long _id, java.lang.String lastuse, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String ip, java.lang.String port, java.lang.String path, java.lang.String workspace)
      Constructor for ServerConnection objects, taking IP and port Strings as inputs and setting those as the instance variables.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Long getID()
      Get method for the ServerConnection ID.
      java.lang.String getIP()
      Get method to get the IP address of the ServerConnection object.
      java.lang.String getLastUse()
      Get method for the field storing the last time the ServerConnection was used to connect to the server.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get method for the user specified ServerConnection name.
      java.lang.String getPath()
      Get method to get the geospatial server path of the ServerConnection object.
      java.lang.String getPort()
      Get method to get the port number of the ServerConnection object.
      java.lang.String getWorkspace()
      Get method to get the optional workspace on the geospatial server.
      void setID(java.lang.Long id)
      Set method for the ServerConnection ID.
      boolean setIP(java.lang.String input)
      Set method to assign an IP address to the ServerConnection object.
      void setLastUse(java.lang.String lastuse)
      Set method for the field storing the last time the ServerConnection was used to connect to the server.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Set method for the ServerConnection name.
      boolean setPath(java.lang.String input)
      Set method to assign a path to the ServerConnection object.
      boolean setPort(java.lang.String input)
      Set method to assign a port number to the ServerConnection object.
      boolean setWorkspace(java.lang.String input)
      Set method to assign a workspace to the ServerConnection object.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Method for getting the full IP address as a String, in the format #.#.#.#:?/A/B where "#" should be a positive integer 0-255, the ? should be a positive integer, the A should be the logical path to the geospatial server or an empty string (in which case no slashes are used) and B should be the workspace name on the server.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerConnection

        public ServerConnection(java.lang.Long _id,
                java.lang.String lastuse,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String ip,
                java.lang.String port,
                java.lang.String path,
                java.lang.String workspace)
        Constructor for ServerConnection objects, taking IP and port Strings as inputs and setting those as the instance variables.
        Parameters:
        _id - The ID of the ServerConnection info from the local SQLite Database.
        lastuse - The last time this ServerConnection was used to access the server.
        name - The user specified name of the connection.
        ip - IP address to assign the ServerConnection object.
        port - Port number to assign the ServerConnection object.
        path - Logical path to the geospatial server to assign the ServerConnection object.
        workspace - Optional workspace on the geospatial server.

    • Method Detail

      • setID

        public void setID(java.lang.Long id)
        Set method for the ServerConnection ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the ServerConnection in the local SQLite Database.

      • setLastUse

        public void setLastUse(java.lang.String lastuse)
        Set method for the field storing the last time the ServerConnection was used to connect to the server.
        Parameters:
        lastuse - The date and time of the last connection.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Set method for the ServerConnection name.
        Parameters:
        name - The user specified name of the ServerConnection.

      • setIP

        public boolean setIP(java.lang.String input)
        Set method to assign an IP address to the ServerConnection object.
        Parameters:
        input - IP address String in the format "#.#.#.#" where # is an integer between 0 & 255.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the set call was successful, else: false.

      • setPort

        public boolean setPort(java.lang.String input)
        Set method to assign a port number to the ServerConnection object.
        Parameters:
        input - Port number string where the string contains an integer.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the set call was successful, else: false.

      • setPath

        public boolean setPath(java.lang.String input)
        Set method to assign a path to the ServerConnection object.
        Parameters:
        input - Path to the geospatial server, a string starting and ending with a slash "/", or empty "".
        Returns:
        Returns true if the set call was successful, else: false.

      • setWorkspace

        public boolean setWorkspace(java.lang.String input)
        Set method to assign a workspace to the ServerConnection object.
        Parameters:
        input - Name of the workspace on the geospatial server, a string without special characters such as "/".
        Returns:
        Returns true if the set call was successful, else: false.

      • getID

        public java.lang.Long getID()
        Get method for the ServerConnection ID.
        Returns:
        The ID of the ServerConnection in the local SQLite Database.

      • getLastUse

        public java.lang.String getLastUse()
        Get method for the field storing the last time the ServerConnection was used to connect to the server.
        Returns:
        The date and time of the last server.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get method for the user specified ServerConnection name.
        Returns:
        The ServerConnection name as a String.

      • getIP

        public java.lang.String getIP()
        Get method to get the IP address of the ServerConnection object.
        Returns:
        The IP address as a String.

      • getPort

        public java.lang.String getPort()
        Get method to get the port number of the ServerConnection object.
        Returns:
        The port number as a String.

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Get method to get the geospatial server path of the ServerConnection object.
        Returns:
        The path as a String.

      • getWorkspace

        public java.lang.String getWorkspace()
        Get method to get the optional workspace on the geospatial server.
        Returns:
        The workspace as a String.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method for getting the full IP address as a String, in the format #.#.#.#:?/A/B where "#" should be a positive integer 0-255, the ? should be a positive integer, the A should be the logical path to the geospatial server or an empty string (in which case no slashes are used) and B should be the workspace name on the server.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The full IP address of the server object.
